# (PART) Administration {-}

# Basic administration

> Add basic informations for Tabebuia's maintainers.

## Updating Tabebuia

```{bash, eval=F}
sudo apt-get update # update packages information
apt list --upgradable # what can be updated
sudo apt-get upgrade # upgrade everything
sudo apt autoremove # remove obsolete packages
sudo apt autoclean # clean cache
```
